E01.title: The Vibe Check (Sum)
E01.description: Read two integers and output their sum.
E01.hint: Hardcode the input values: var a = 10; var b = 20; then spit(a + b)

E02.title: Odd or Even Vibe?
E02.description: Check if a number is odd or even.
E02.hint: Hardcode the input: var n = 7; Use modulo % to check if divisible by 2

E03.title: Who is the Biggest Bro?
E03.description: Find the maximum of two numbers.
E03.hint: Hardcode the inputs: var a = 50; var b = 12; Compare and output the larger

E04.title: Simple Countdown
E04.hint: Hardcode the input: var n = 5; Use a loop to count down, output with spaces

E05.title: Echo Chamber
E05.description: Print a word three times with spaces.
E05.hint: Hardcode the input: var word = "Bro"; Output it 3 times with spaces between

E06.title: Positive Vibes Only
E06.description: Return absolute value of a number.
E06.hint: Hardcode the input: var n = -42; Use abs() or conditional to make positive

E07.title: String Length
E07.description: Find the length of a string.
E07.hint: Hardcode the input: var str = "BroCode"; Use len() function

E08.title: Celsius to Fahrenheit
E08.hint: Hardcode the input: var celsius = 25; Formula: (celsius * 9/5) + 32

E09.title: First Character
E09.description: Get the first character of a string.
E09.hint: Hardcode the input: var str = "Pizza"; Use string indexing [0]

E10.title: Cube It
E10.description: Calculate the cube of a number.
E10.hint: Hardcode the input: var n = 3; Calculate n * n * n

M01.title: Reverse the Hype
M01.hint: Hardcode the input: var str = "Hello"; Loop backwards or use built-in

M02.title: Factorial Fun
M02.hint: Hardcode the input: var n = 5; Multiply 5 * 4 * 3 * 2 * 1

M03.title: FizzBuzz Classic
M03.description: Print FizzBuzz sequence from 1 to n.
M03.hint: Hardcode the input: var n = 5; Fizz if divisible by 3, Buzz by 5, FizzBuzz by both

M04.title: Array Max
M04.description: Find maximum value in an array.
M04.hint: Hardcode array and loop to find max value

M05.title: Palindrome Checker
M05.description: Check if a string is a palindrome.
M05.hint: Hardcode the input: var str = "racecar"; Check if equals its reverse

M06.title: Sum of Digits
M06.description: Calculate sum of digits in a number.
M06.hint: Hardcode the input: var num = "123"; Convert to string, loop and sum digits

M07.title: Count Vowels
M07.description: Count vowels in a string (case insensitive).
M07.hint: Hardcode the input: var str = "BroCode"; Check each char if it's a, e, i, o, u

M08.title: Linear Search
M08.description: Find index of target value in array.
M08.hint: Hardcode target and array, return index (or -1 if not found)

M09.title: Power Up
M09.hint: Hardcode the inputs: var base = 2; var exp = 3; Calculate 2^3

M10.title: Remove Duplicates
M10.description: Remove duplicate characters from string (keep first occurrence).
M10.hint: Hardcode the input: var str = "banana"; Keep only first occurrence of each char

H01.title: Prime Time
H01.description: Check if a number is prime.
H01.hint: Hardcode the input: var n = 17; Check divisibility up to sqrt(n)

H02.title: Fibonacci Nth
H02.hint: Hardcode the input: var n = 5; Sequence: 0,1,1,2,3,5,8... Return 5th element (3)

H03.title: Sort It Out
H03.hint: Hardcode array and implement bubble/selection sort

H04.title: Anagram Check
H04.description: Check if two strings are anagrams.
H04.hint: Hardcode both strings and check if they have same characters

H05.title: Matrix Diagonal Sum
H05.description: Sum the main diagonal of a square matrix.

H06.title: Second Largest
H06.description: Find the second largest number in array.
H06.hint: Hardcode array and track both max and second max

H07.title: Word Count
H07.description: Count words in a string (separated by spaces).
H07.hint: Hardcode string and split by spaces, count non-empty words

H08.title: Pattern Printing
H08.description: Print a pattern of asterisks (n rows).
H08.hint: Hardcode the input: var n = 3; Print 1 star, then 2, then 3 (each on new line)

H09.title: Missing Number
H09.description: Find missing number in range [0, n].
H09.hint: Hardcode array with numbers 0 to n, one missing. Find which one.

H10.title: Bracket Balancer
H10.hint: Hardcode string and use counter (increment for '(', decrement for ')')
